argument.description: An expression for which the collation key is determined.
An expression for which the collation key is determined.
An expression for which the collation key is determined.

description: The COLLATION_KEY function returns a VARBINARY string that represents the collation key of the expression argument, in the specified collation.
sample:
SELECT FIRSTNME, LASTNAME
      FROM EMPLOYEE
         ORDER BY COLLATION_KEY (LASTNAME, 'SYSTEM_923_DE')
